wikipedia_page.main: Vice Admiral Sir Richard Tobias Frere   (born Frere-Reeves; 4 June 1938 – 5 March 2020) was a Royal Navy officer who ended his career as Chief of Fleet Support.

response: In 1927, he married journalist Patricia Marion Caldecott Wallace, the daughter of writer Edgar Wallace. They had two sons, Alexander and Vice Admiral Sir Toby Frere, and a daughter, Elizabeth Frere Jones, who moved to Brooklyn, New York.
*Sir Toby Frere, 81, British vice admiral, Chief of Fleet Support (1994–1997).Frere
